pt2ir_t Class Reference

Detailed Description

pt2ir_t is a class that can convert PT raw trace to DynamoRIO's IR.

Member Function Documentation

◆ convert()

pt2ir_convert_status_t pt2ir_t::convert ( )

Returns pt2ir_convert_status_t.

Note
The convert function performs two processes: (1) decode the PT raw trace into libipt's IR format pt_insn; (2) convert pt_insn into the DynamoRIO's IR format instr_t. If the convertion is successful, the function returns PT2IR_CONV_SUCCESS. Otherwise, the function returns the corresponding error code.

◆ get_instr_count()

uint64_t pt2ir_t::get_instr_count ( )

Returns the number of instructions in the converted IR.

◆ init()

bool pt2ir_t::init ( IN pt2ir_config_t &  pt2ir_config)

Returns true if the pt2ir_t is successfully initialized. Returns false on failure.

Note
Parse struct pt2ir_config_t and initialize PT instruction decoder, the sideband session, and images caches.

◆ print_instrs_to_stdout()

void pt2ir_t::print_instrs_to_stdout ( )

Print the disassembled text of all valid instructions to STDOUT.
